description.value: The riding drake breathes a @Template[cone|distance:30] of fire, dealing @Damage[((ceil(@actor.level/2))d6)[fire]|options:area-damage]{1d6 fire damage for every 2 levels the drake has} to all creatures in the area (@Check[reflex|basic|options:area-effect] save). This uses a trained DC using the drake's Constitution modifier or an expert DC if the drake is specialized.
